basic.floral_language:
Hyacinthus orientalis 'Fondant '
Floriography: vitality, fraternity, self-confidence
Hyacinth orientalis is known as "western narcissus", was cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Hyacinth plant state low, inflorescence is plumy, flowers open from bottom to top, appearance beautiful, of quietly elegant fragrance can stabilize mood, eliminate fatigue. It is often put on the head of a bed, to create a warm and comfortable rest environment. 
Hyacinth likes sunshine, full bloom in spring, flowering 3-4 weeks. Keep the bulbs for germination in the coming year in cold, and under normal circumstances it can bloom every year
basic.blooming: Flowering period March-April, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, in every 4-5 days
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
